picks.full-pick-text: Stephen will end up buying both the iPhone 17 Air and the 17 Pro within the span of 12 months
picks.notes:
• Specifically for himself, not for a family member.
  • "Within 12 months" is referring to the date of the pick, which is when it'll be graded anyway, but we're all just having some fun here, not worrying about the rule arguments as much this time.

picks.text: When reading this pick, Stephen will confess to another piece of technology that he has broken and not told us about

picks.notes: • If it's the iPhone 17 Air specifically, then extra props go to Federico for calling it.
